availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Robert Jameson (Barren County, Kentucky, laborer and captain in 21st Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.))

body.p: Barren County, Kentucky, laborer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of John B. Jameson and Kessiah Jones Jameson. Student in Barren County in 1850. Laborer in Barren County in 1860. Served in the 21st Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as first lieutenant and captain from February 27, 1862, to June 12, 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Barren County, Division 2, p. 434B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Barren County, District 1, p. 784.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 339.
U.S. Civil War Pension Index: General Index to Pension Files, 1861-1934, NARA RG 15, Microfilm Series T288, Kentucky, Application #1170363, Certificate #902686.
